00030 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00031 
00032 #include <llog_swab.h>
00033 #include <lustre_swab.h>
00034 #include <obd.h>
00035 #include <md_object.h>
00036 
00044 void lustre_lma_init(struct lustre_mdt_attrs *lma, const struct lu_fid *fid,
00045                      __u32 compat, __u32 incompat)
00046 {
00047         lma->lma_compat   = compat;
00048         lma->lma_incompat = incompat;
00049         lma->lma_self_fid = *fid;
00050 
00051         /* If a field is added in struct lustre_mdt_attrs, zero it explicitly
00052          * and change the test below. */
00053         LASSERT(sizeof(*lma) ==
00054                 (offsetof(struct lustre_mdt_attrs, lma_self_fid) +
00055                  sizeof(lma->lma_self_fid)));
00056 };
00057 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lustre_lma_init);
00058 
00064 void lustre_lma_swab(struct lustre_mdt_attrs *lma)
00065 {
00066 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
00067         __swab32s(&lma->lma_compat);
00068         __swab32s(&lma->lma_incompat);
00069         lustre_swab_lu_fid(&lma->lma_self_fid);
00070 #endif
00071 };
00072 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lustre_lma_swab);
00073 
00080 void lustre_hsm_swab(struct hsm_attrs *attrs)
00081 {
00082 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
00083         __swab32s(&attrs->hsm_compat);
00084         __swab32s(&attrs->hsm_flags);
00085         __swab64s(&attrs->hsm_arch_id);
00086         __swab64s(&attrs->hsm_arch_ver);
00087 #endif
00088 };
00089 
00090 /*
00091  * Swab and extract HSM attributes from on-disk xattr.
00092  *
00093  * \param buf - is a buffer containing the on-disk HSM extended attribute.
00094  * \param rc  - is the HSM xattr stored in \a buf
00095  * \param mh  - is the md_hsm structure where to extract HSM attributes.
00096  */
00097 int lustre_buf2hsm(void *buf, int rc, struct md_hsm *mh)
00098 {
00099         struct hsm_attrs *attrs = (struct hsm_attrs *)buf;
00100         ENTRY;
00101 
00102         if (rc == 0 ||  rc == -ENODATA)
00103                 /* no HSM attributes */
00104                 RETURN(-ENODATA);
00105 
00106         if (rc < 0)
00107                 /* error hit while fetching xattr */
00108                 RETURN(rc);
00109 
00110         /* unpack HSM attributes */
00111         lustre_hsm_swab(attrs);
00112 
00113         /* fill md_hsm structure */
00114         mh->mh_compat   = attrs->hsm_compat;
00115         mh->mh_flags    = attrs->hsm_flags;
00116         mh->mh_arch_id  = attrs->hsm_arch_id;
00117         mh->mh_arch_ver = attrs->hsm_arch_ver;
00118 
00119         RETURN(0);
00120 }
00121 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lustre_buf2hsm);
00122 
00123 /*
00124  * Pack HSM attributes.
00125  *
00126  * \param buf - is the output buffer where to pack the on-disk HSM xattr.
00127  * \param mh  - is the md_hsm structure to pack.
00128  */
00129 void lustre_hsm2buf(void *buf, const struct md_hsm *mh)
00130 {
00131         struct hsm_attrs *attrs = (struct hsm_attrs *)buf;
00132         ENTRY;
00133 
00134         /* copy HSM attributes */
00135         attrs->hsm_compat   = mh->mh_compat;
00136         attrs->hsm_flags    = mh->mh_flags;
00137         attrs->hsm_arch_id  = mh->mh_arch_id;
00138         attrs->hsm_arch_ver = mh->mh_arch_ver;
00139 
00140         /* pack xattr */
00141         lustre_hsm_swab(attrs);
00142 }
00143 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lustre_hsm2buf);
